articles.description: After their worst start to a season in more than 30 years, how did manager Oliver Glasner steer Crystal Palace to their first major trophy?
articles.title: Crystal Palace win FA Cup: How Oliver Glasner led Eagles to first major trophy

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler will take a three-shot lead into the final round at the US PGA Championship after a stunning six-under-par round on Saturday.
articles.title: US PGA Championship 2025: Scottie Scheffler leads heading into final round

articles.description: Erling Haaland's Wembley goal drought continues as he fails to score on his sixth visit during Manchester City's FA Cup final loss to Crystal Palace.
articles.title: FA Cup final: Erling Haaland's Wembley goal drought continues

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is "gutted" by Ferrari's performance at the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix while team-mate Charles Leclerc says it "hurts".
articles.title: Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix: Charles Leclerc says Ferrari 'P-nowhere' with Lewis Hamilton 'devastated'

articles.description: Newly-crowned Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich finish the season with a 3-0 win against Hoffenheim as Thomas Muller makes his final appearance for the club.
articles.title: Thomas Muller says farewell as Bayern Munich win on final day

articles.description: Jasmine Paolini produces a scintillating display she blows away Coco Gauff in straight sets to end a 40-year wait for a home winner of the women's singles at the Italian Open.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jasmine Paolini beats Coco Gauff to end wait for home women's singles winner

articles.description: McLaren's Oscar Piastri beats Red Bull's Max Verstappen to pole position at the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix.
articles.title: Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix: Oscar Piastri beats Max Verstappen to pole after Yuki Tsunoda crash in Imola

articles.description: He never got the chance to make his Arsenal debut, but after joining Monaco in January Mika Biereth has become one of the most prolific strikers in Europe.
articles.title: Mika Biereth: The former Arsenal man scoring goals for fun for Monaco

articles.description: Striker Marcus Rashford is happy to take a pay cut in order to get a move from Manchester United to Barcelona, Arsenal braced for Jakub Kiwior bid from Napoli, AC Milan turn down Manchester City offer for Tijjani Reijnders.
articles.title: Football gossip: Rashford, Kiwior, Amorim, Reijnders, Frimpong, Sane, Kelleher, Vinicius Jr

articles.description: Australian Luke Plapp wins stage eight of the Giro d'Italia while Diego Ulissi leads the general classification.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Luke Plapp wins stage eight, Diego Ulissi takes overall lead
